word:
Obedience must come from the heart. It was always heart work with Christ. If you love Jesus, you will not think that it is a hard task to obey; you will obey as members of the royal family. Whether you are with me or apart from me, whether you see your way clearly or not, go forward in 


                                -334- 

obedience; for this is clear. All issues and results are to be left with God, who has given us His holy law, the transcript of His character.
